name: Essay Maker 0.3
tagline: GET RID OF THAT STUPID GRAPHIC ESSAY ORGANIZER.
body:
> I bet if you asked a kid what they think about graphic essay organizers, they'd all despise them.

Graphic organizers on paper are old. Lucidchart did this right by making graphic organizers online. The only one they left out was the graphic essay organizer. We fixed that.
[Click here to download it!](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9_evHdY7ZEdZ1dtYXR5bHIzMGc/view?usp=sharing)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
